tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance_schedule (
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_task_id INT NOT NULL,
  scheduled_date DATE NOT NULL,
  completion_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    frequency INT,
    last_completed DATE,
    equipment_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  scheduled_date DATE NOT NULL,
  scheduled_time TIME NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceTask (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  is_completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TaskAssignment (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  technician_id INT,
  task_id INT,
  assigned_date DATE NOT NULL,
  assigned_time TIME NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (technician_id) REFERENCES Technician(technician_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTask(task_id)
);
